Whoa, back up. The shields are indeed up. They encompas the base with
about 10 feet distance from the CF to the shields. From what I
understand (Megan can tell you this for sure, since she's in charge of
the base), Maximals and weaponfire can go out through the shields, but
nothing can come back in. At least that's what Kluster had been doing,
shooting from behind the shields.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> FireBlade got to the side of the CF and blasted the metal with a few
> more shots of his flame and a round part of the metal turned red
> hot...He covered the Flame thrower tip with hit tip of his 6 foot
long
> blade and jabbed it in and carved out a circle....He was in..He
looked
> up and saw that he was in a storage room..."Nice place to enter" he
> said to himself....
